description.code:
SAMPLES – INTERLUDE – SOUND EFFECTS
Game boy color, Game boy Advance, Dreamcast, Sega and Playstation 1 startups sounds.
Several Metal Gear Solid, Soul Calibur, Wario Ware, Wario Land 4, Donkey Kong, Animal Crossing
Ace Attorney and Bomberman sound effects.
Merci a Sophie pour le jingle ouïdire Japonais.
